channel.title: RuneStream Reborn
channel.description:
Hey, Welcome to my project thread. Some of you may know me and my old server. RunStream was a great pking based server about a year ago. I am going to bring it back with totaly new features. The home will be based like Battlescape Isle. The features will be really great and we hope the eccomany will be good too. the beta will have spawning and stuff like that. I work alone and i always have. I don't let people work with be because that how your source gets leeked. The RuneStream Source was leeked a while ago but this time it wont be. The base is hayzie's Emulator 1.7 the server has dueling with some bugs that we will fix.
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u] Great Pking System. Great Dueling System. Packaged Server. MultiZone's King Black Dragon. Great Eccomany, Great Stablity. Great Special's
[u][b]Server Update's[/b][/u] Pvp Reward Systemm added Barrows Reward System Improved. The Home Area is Alot Complete Hill Giants. Moore Coming Soon.
[u][b]Small Beta[/b][/u]
Hamachi Network: RuneStream NetWork Password: 123 Server Ip: 5.218.82.186
Note: Server will be No-Ip For actually Release.
[u][b]Picture's & Video's[/b][/u] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z4w7gtMkEAU
Thanks, Jamie

Server Features Great Pking System. Great Dueling System. Packaged Server. MultiZone's King Black Dragon. Great Eccomany, Great Stablity. Great Special's

Hey, Welcome to my project thread. Some of you may know me and my old server. RunStream was a great pking based server about a year ago. I am going to bring it back with totaly new features. The home will be based like Battlescape Isle. The features will be really great and we hope the eccomany will be good too. the beta will have spawning and stuff like that. I work alone and i always have. I don’t let people work with be because that how your source gets leeked. The RuneStream Source was leeked a while ago but this time it wont be.
